content.introduction:
Replaces nested 
std::min
 and 
std::max
 calls with an initializer list
where applicable.

For instance, consider the following code:

int
 
a
 
=
 
std
::
max
(
std
::
max
(
i
,
 
j
),
 
k
);

The check will transform the above code to:

int
 
a
 
=
 
std
::
max
({
i
,
 
j
,
 
k
});
